pkgmetadata.longdescription: Process Control And Internal Validation Of Forensic STR Kits // strvalidator is an open source platform for validation and process control. It provide tools to analyse data from internal validation of forensic short tandem repeat (STR) kits. The tools are developed to provide the necessary data to conform with the ENFSI guidelines for internal validation. More information about each function can be found in the respective help documentation.
